mapper.insert: insert into daycheck (empno, 월요일, 화요일, 수요일, 목요일, 금요일, year, month) values (#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6}, #{param7}, #{param8})
mapper.update: update daycheck set 월요일=#{param1}, 화요일=#{param2}, 수요일=#{param3}, 목요일=#{param4}, 금요일=#{param5} where empno = #{param6}
mapper.insert: insert into schedule_request (empno, monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, year, month) values (#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6}, #{param7}, #{param8})
